text: Gergely Szilveszter Karácsony (; born 11 June 1975) is a Hungarian politician and political scientist. He became Mayor of Budapest in 2019. He was a member of the National Assembly (MP) from 2010 to 2014 and Mayor of Zugló from 2014 to 2019. Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Hungarian mayors Category:Politicians from Budapest
title: Gergely Karácsony
